content.description: Left face of Spartan boulder (steel pole drilled into the left side). High start on good foot rail and wide hand holds on decent holds. Straight up to double hand deep pocket hold. Work left to small crimps work feet to deep pocket hold. Work back right to missy holds. Advance to the top. Highball very committing.
content.location: Spartan boulder in the middle of the Arena. Has steel pole on left side.

content.description: Start on two 6ft high crimps right foot small nub. Bump to double hand rail slight left then right. Pull up full stand on nub. Left foot up to small toe crimp, crux is throw high to left hand pocket, fast right hand pocket, work feet to start crimps. Left hand sloping top rail, left foot to first double hand rail. Right hand high up to top mantle left hand match. Mantle and work feet up for a finish.
content.location: North/left face about 20ft from the water.
